creator: jason.greene@jboss.com
text:
XML Security currently relies on a class that was removed in version 2.7.X of xalan.
In 1.2.1 org.apache.xml.security.Init references
org.apache.xpath.compiler.FuncLoader. This reference was moved in lastest CVS to
CachedXPathAPIHolder. 

Thanks,
-Jason

creator: raul-info@r-bg.com
text:
Have you try with CVS Head?
There is a current a prelease of 1.3 in
http://xml.apache.org/security/dist/java-library/xmlsec-1.2.96.jar, have you
tried with this also?

I think this bug was fixed a long ago using reflection. But perhaps it is
another problem?

Yes you are right, I should have noticed that CachedXPathAPIHolder gracefuly
handles ClassNotFoundException.

Sorry about the confusion.
creator: jason.greene@jboss.com
